lead_paragraph: Indian shot putter Inderjeet Singh said on Tuesday he has been notified by the national anti-doping agency (NADA) that he has returned a positive test for banned substances in his A sample.

headline.print_headline: Indian Shot Putter Fails Doping Test
headline.main: Indian Shot Putter Fails Doping Test

snippet: Indian shot putter Inderjeet Singh said on Tuesday he has been notified by the national anti-doping agency (NADA) that he has returned a positive test for banned substances in his A sample....
